query:
-- مقارنة الإيرادات الفعلية مع المسجلة في البونص للأسبوع 1 من يناير 2026
SELECT 
  'إيرادات فعلية' as source,
  er.employeeId,
  e.name as employeeName,
  dr.branchId,
  SUM(er.total) as totalRevenue
FROM employeeRevenues er
LEFT JOIN dailyRevenues dr ON er.dailyRevenueId = dr.id
LEFT JOIN employees e ON er.employeeId = e.id
WHERE dr.date >= '2026-01-01' AND dr.date <= '2026-01-07'
GROUP BY er.employeeId, e.name, dr.branchId

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'بونص مسجل' as source,
  bd.employeeId,
  e.name as employeeName,
  wb.branchId,
  bd.weeklyRevenue as totalRevenue
FROM bonusDetails bd
LEFT JOIN employees e ON bd.employeeId = e.id
LEFT JOIN weeklyBonuses wb ON bd.weeklyBonusId = wb.id
WHERE wb.weekNumber = 1 AND wb.month = 1 AND wb.year = 2026

ORDER BY employeeId, source;

SELECT 
  'إيرادات فعلية' as source,
  er.employeeId,
  e.name as employeeName,
  dr.branchId,
  SUM(er.total) as totalRevenue
FROM employeeRevenues er
LEFT JOIN dailyRevenues dr ON er.dailyRevenueId = dr.id
LEFT JOIN employees e ON er.employeeId = e.id
WHERE dr.date >= '2026-01-01' AND dr.date <= '2026-01-07'
GROUP BY er.employeeId, e.name, dr.branchId

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'بونص مسجل' as source,
  bd.employeeId,
  e.name as employeeName,
  wb.branchId,
  bd.weeklyRevenue as totalRevenue
FROM bonusDetails bd
LEFT JOIN employees e ON bd.employeeId = e.id
LEFT JOIN weeklyBonuses wb ON bd.weeklyBonusId = wb.id
WHERE wb.weekNumber = 1 AND wb.month = 1 AND wb.year = 2026

ORDER BY employeeId, source;
